T02TD2447E:81a-0: @81a * // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2447E:81a-1: mkha' 'gros byin brlabs rtogs pa'i brda //
T02TD2447E:81a-2: til ni sgron me gsal bar byed //
T02TD2447E:81a-3: sngags kyis btab ba'i sman bzhin du //
T02TD2447E:81a-4: rma bya'i zas ni gzhan gyis min //
T02TD2447E:81a-5: tsandan ri dags lte ba'i dri //
T02TD2447E:81a-6: chu yi rlabs ni rgya mtsho nyid //
T02TD2447E:81a-7: gsal ba'i rang bzhin ras dkar 'dra //
T02TD2447E:81a-8: ri bo bskyod par mi nus pas //
T02TD2447E:81a-9: gangs ri chu las gzhan med de //
T02TD2447E:81a-10: dri dang sgog skya tha dad min //
T02TD2447E:81a-11: nyi zla'i yon tan gsal ba yin //
T02TD2447E:81a-12: bya yi rjes ni tshol mi byed //
T02TD2447E:81a-13: nam mkha' rtog ge'i spyod yul min //
T02TD2447E:81a-14: mandala phyogs cha rab tu snyoms //
T02TD2447E:81a-15: ro langs bya sar dkon ne bzhin //
T02TD2447E:81a-16: dpe med ngo mtshar nor bu shel //
T02TD2447E:81a-17: zhes rngon pa ba chen po sa ra has ka ma la sh'i la la lta ba'i brda bstan pa'o /
T02TD2447E:81a-19: // / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2447E:81a-20: mkha' 'gros byin brlabs bsgom pa'i brda //
T02TD2447E:81a-21: tshang tshing nags kyi dur khrod du //
T02TD2447E:81a-22: bdag med ma dang phrad byas la //
T02TD2447E:81a-23: nyi ma shar ba'i bsam pa yis //
T02TD2447E:81a-24: las zin pa yi skyes bu bzhin //
T02TD2447E:81a-25: spyi bo'i nor bu mchod nas kyang//
T02TD2447E:81a-26: khang pa stong pa'i khyi bzhin du //
T02TD2447E:81a-27: sman pa'i don stor nam mkhar khyer //
T02TD2447E:81a-28: chu bo chen po'i rgyun 'bab bzhin //
T02TD2447E:81a-29: drang srong ku sha'i steng du bzhag / mar me rlung dang bral ba bzhin //
T02TD2447E:81a-30: dngul dkar me long phyi bar bya //
T02TD2447E:81a-31: yid 'ong bral ba'i ma bzhin du //
T02TD2447E:81a-32: rus sbal 'khar gzhong nyi ma la //
T02TD2447E:81a-33: rtsal ldan 'phong slob brtson pa ste //
T02TD2447E:81a-34: mda' mkhan yid ni gcig tu gtod //
T02TD2447E:81a-35: gdams pa'i gtsor ni nges par grol //
T02TD2447E:81a-36: gser las byas pa'i rgyan bzhin du //
T02TD2447E:81a-37: bu ram ro la myang bar bya //
T02TD2447E:81a-38: zhes rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la sh'i la la bsgom pa'i brda bstan pa'o /
T02TD2447E:81b-0: // / dpal @81b he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2447E:81b-1: mkha' 'gros byin brlabs spyod pa'i brda //
T02TD2447E:81b-2: bag ma 'am smyon pa'i tshul bzung ste //
T02TD2447E:81b-3: glang po btsongs la phag rgod bsad //
T02TD2447E:81b-4: nya ni rgya mtshor yangs pa che //
T02TD2447E:81b-5: nags rnams me yis rab tu sreg / res 'ga' mgyogs pa'i rta la zhon //
T02TD2447E:81b-6: gri gug rnon po'i mtshon gyis ni //
T02TD2447E:81b-7: ce spyang dur khrod rnam par rol //
T02TD2447E:81b-8: spyan gzigs zas la rtag tu spyad //
T02TD2447E:81b-9: khra yi rtsal ni nges par drag / wa ni dur khrod rnam par rol //
T02TD2447E:81b-11: me tog sgyu ma bung ba ste //
T02TD2447E:81b-12: bu chung seng ge me long 'dra //
T02TD2447E:81b-13: stag ni 'jigs pa med par rgyu //
T02TD2447E:81b-14: sgron me rtag tu thogs byas te //
T02TD2447E:81b-15: glang po zhon la kun du rgyug / zhes rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la sh'i la la spyod pa'i brda bstan pa'o /
T02TD2447E:81b-17: // / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2447E:81b-20: shel gyi 'od zer nang nas shar //
T02TD2447E:81b-21: rma bya'i ri mo su yis bris //
T02TD2447E:81b-23: rtog med re ba nor bu bskang //
T02TD2447E:81b-25: gtsub stan me ni rtsol bas 'byin //
T02TD2447E:81b-26: shing ni rang gis rang la bsreg / gser gyi kha dog mtshur gyis 'don //
T02TD2447E:81b-27: dgra med mi ni zon dang bral //
T02TD2447E:81b-28: gnyid sad skyes bu de ci sems //
T02TD2447E:81b-29: byis pa aa lus 'brid pa ltos //
T02TD2447E:81b-30: nam mkha' nam mkha' nam mkha'i dang //
T02TD2447E:81b-31: chu bran rgya mtsho'i dbyings su 'dres //
T02TD2447E:81b-32: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2447E:81b-33: chu zla du ma yod ma yin //
T02TD2447E:81b-34: zhes rngon pa bas ka ma la sh'i la la 'bras bu'i brda bstan pa'o /
T02TD2447E:81b-36: // / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2447E:81b-37: mkha' 'gros byin brlabs lam gyi brda //
T02TD2447E:81b-38: sngom ni tshad las mi 'da' bar //
T02TD2447E:81b-40: khra yi rtsa la yangs pa med //
T02TD2447E:81b-41: rtag tu 'khor lo'i rtse la zhon //
T02TD2447E:81b-42: rdza mkhan bu la yangs pa med //
T02TD2447E:81b-43: ral gri til ngar ldan pa gces //
T02TD2447E:81b-44: me la rlung gis bskyod pa yis //
T02TD2447E:81b-45: tshang ching nags kyi dur khrod bsreg / bram ze skud pa 'khal la ltos //
T02TD2447E:81b-46: bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu mchog / snying chung de ni mi ro yin //
T02TD2447E:82a-2: 'khor lo'i srub thag gcad par bya //
T02TD2447E:82a-3: sprin med mkha' la nyi shar bzhin //
T02TD2447E:82a-4: lho sprin rlung gis brda bar bya //
T02TD2447E:82a-6: so mtshams mkhar gyi bdag po ltos //
T02TD2447E:82a-7: rin chen gter gyi me la tshe gyis //
T02TD2447E:82a-8: nam mkhas nam mkha' grol bar nges //
T02TD2447E:82a-9: zhes rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la sh'i la la lam gyi brda bstan pa'o /
T02TD2447E:82a-11: // / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2447E:82a-12: mkha' 'gros byin brlabs nyams kyi brda //
T02TD2447E:82a-13: dkar po'i zla ba rim pa ste //
T02TD2447E:82a-14: 'ja' tshon nam mkha' nyid la mdzes //
T02TD2447E:82a-15: gzhon nus smras pa ci ste go //
T02TD2447E:82a-16: chus bkang nas ni smrar mi btub //
T02TD2447E:82a-17: khug rna dang ba'i rnam pa bzhin //
T02TD2447E:82a-18: dbul mo gter ldan ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2447E:82a-19: lan tshva chu bo nyid la thim //
T02TD2447E:82a-20: bya ni mkha' las 'da' mi nus //
T02TD2447E:82a-21: dgras bslus gnyen la'ang yid ma gtod //
T02TD2447E:82a-22: ral gri ngar ldan ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2447E:82a-23: rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jigs mi byed //
T02TD2447E:82a-24: wa yis seng ge skrag pa min //
T02TD2447E:82a-25: bya ni mkha' la rtsol sgrub med //
T02TD2447E:82a-26: mkha' dang cho 'phrul tha dad min //
T02TD2447E:82a-27: nam mkha' gang gis za bar nus //
T02TD2447E:82a-28: chu ni ma rnyog bzhag na dangs //
T02TD2447E:82a-29: 'di nyid yin dang ma yin zhes //
T02TD2447E:82a-30: sus byas su yis go ba su //
T02TD2447E:82a-31: zhes rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la sh'i la la nyams kyi brda bstan pa'o /
T02TD2447E:82a-33: // / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2447E:82a-34: mkha' 'gros byin brlabs gnad kyi brda //
T02TD2447E:82a-35: seng ge glang chen phag rgod bsad //
T02TD2447E:82a-36: rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong po bzhin //
T02TD2447E:82a-37: nags kyi ri dags gal la tshud //
T02TD2447E:82a-38: gzings kyi bya rog gar bder thong //
T02TD2447E:82a-39: dangs ma'i chur ni gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02TD2447E:82a-40: mkha' la tshon gyis bskur mi nus //
T02TD2447E:82a-41: ri bo rlung gis bsgul ba min //
T02TD2447E:82a-42: rgya mtsho chen po gting mi g-yo //
T02TD2447E:82a-43: snying chung de ni skal bar ldan //
T02TD2447E:82a-44: seng ge'i gsob la byis pa 'jigs //
T02TD2447E:82a-45: bung ba'i spyod pa yid kyis ltos //
T02TD2447E:82a-46: bu shi'i mya ngan sems la zhog / sgron me lag tu thogs pa'i mi //
T02TD2447E:82a-47: kun gyi sna la 'gro bar gyis //
T02TD2447E:82a-48: de nas nam mkha'i phyi nang 'dre //
T02TD2447E:82a-50: rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la shi la la gnad kyi gdams pa bstan ba'o /
